item-h2: University of Canterbury Grant Lingard Scholarship for Academic Achievement 2025
item-desc: The purpose of this scholarship is to reward the academic achievement of full-time students about to enter the final year of a Bachelor of Fine Arts (BFA) degree in the School of Fine Arts at the University of Canterbury.

item-h2: Lawson-Smith Freemasons Education Trust Veterinary and Animal Science Scholarships 2025 (Up to $10,000)
item-desc: Lawson-Smith Freemasons Education Trust Veterinary and Animal Science Scholarships  have been established under the terms of the Will of the late Max Lawson-Smith, to promote and support the studying of veterinary programmes programs at Massey University.

item-h2: University of Waikato Vice Chancellor's International Excellence Scholarship 2025 (Up to NZD$15,000)
item-desc:
The University welcomes applications for the Vice Chancellor's International Excellence Scholarship from international students who are new to studying at the University of Waikato, and who will be coming to study here for face-to-face study in C Trimester 2024 or in 2025.

item-h2: Freemasons University Scholarships for Undergraduate Students 2025 (Up to $10,000)
item-desc:
The Freemasons Scholarships are to assist able students who are actively involved in their community, to complete their university education in their chosen field.  The scholarships are provided annually, funded and administered by The Freemasons Charity.

item-h2: University of Canterbury Charles and Austin Henry Alabaster Scholarship 2025 (Funded)
item-desc: Charles and Austin Henry Alabaster 2025 scholarships are offered to students enrolled in undergraduate Greek and Latin courses at the University of Canterbury.

item-h2: Society for Underwater Technology Scholarships for Exceptional Students 2024-2025 (Up to $5000)
item-desc:
The Society for Underwater Technology awards a selection of scholarships every year, to recognise exceptional students and provide targeted financial support to see them complete their studies and start their career in the industry.

item-desc: The University is offering scholarships for 2024 to support our final year undergraduate students choosing to progress to postgraduate study at Kent. item-h2: University of Canterbury Bickerton-Widdowson Trust Memorial Scholarship for Undergraduate and Postgraduate Students 2025
item-desc: Bickerton-Widdowson Trust Memorial scholarship is to assist students in the continuance of studies in the School of Fine Arts at the University of Canterbury.

item-h2: Royal Geographical Society Ralph Brown Expedition Award 2025 in UK (Up to £12,500)

item-h2: University of Waikato Terry Healy Memorial Award for Postgraduate Students 2025 (Funded)
item-desc: The University of Waikato are happy to offer Terry Healy Memorial Award for students who are currently enrolled part- or full-time in a masters or doctoral degree in an Earth Sciences subject and have not previously received the Award.

item-h2: Royal Geographical Society Thesiger-Oman Fellowships 2025 (Awarding up to £8,000)
item-desc:
The Thesiger-Oman International Fellowships offer two awards annually to post-doctoral researchers to advance geographical knowledge, involving fieldwork, in an arid or semi-arid environment.

item-h2: University of Waikato Ian McLaren Memorial Scholarship for Undergraduate Students 2024-2025 (Up to $5,000)
item-desc: Ian McLaren Memorial Scholarship are offered to students enrolled full-time (i.e. 120- points) in the second or consecutive year of an undergraduate programme in the Division of Education at University of Waikato.

item-h2: Royal Geographical Society 2025 Walters Kundert Fellowship (Up to £10,000)
item-desc:
The Walters Kundert Fellowship offers awards annually to support field research in physical geography within Arctic and/or high mountain environments, with preference for field studies that advance the understanding of environmental change past or present.

item-h2: Flinders University Vice-Chancellor Domestic Academic Excellence Scholarship 2024
item-desc: We're excited to introduce the Flinders University Vice-Chancellor’s High Achiever Scholarships for undergraduate students – a way for us to support high achieving students looking to study at Flinders University to be fearless and pursue their career goals.
